name: Parking Simulator Cube World
description:
Learn how to park in incredible world of cubes and improve your driving skills! Are you dreaming of getting you driver license and driving your own car? May be you even want to be extreme sport car racing or long distance car driver? Surely, these dreams will come true soon! Until then you can play Parking Simulator: Cube World 3D – extremely addictive and realistic! Enjoy special cube design and train your driving skills.

We have a lot of different tasks for you: backyard parking, parallel parking and other. Control your car using gas pedal and breaks. Don't crash into other car or into the wall and you'll pass this exam.

Parking Simulator: Cube World game features:
• Amazing low poly cube design;
• Driving simulator and parking simulator 3D;
• Different tasks – try different parking ways;
• Different car models – choose your favourite;
• Addictive gameplay;
• Cool graphics, animation and sounds.

Explore world of pixels, drive beautiful cars and learn parking in Parking Simulator: Cube World 3D!
